content: the **glitzy bolero** is a fashionable accessory to keep your shoulders warm during a chill spring or summer night or to complete your outfit at a winter party such as new year s eve celebrations > this pattern is part of the **spring > into summer bundle & blog hop** with > 33 amazing patterns for spring and > summer take a look at all the > patterns included ** here 1 ** *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** 6 0-mm j/10 usa 4 uk crochet hook worsted 4 medium weight yarn tapestry needle **yarn** i used katia concept pure 100% pima cotton 109 yds/100 m per 50 g color 80 and ice yarns alpaca glitz 29% alpaca 35% wool 33% acrylic 2% polyamide 1% lurex 114 yds/105 m per 50 g color grey silver feel free to use any comparable yarn that meets gauge **size** the pattern is written for sizes s/xs m/l xl/2xl 3-5xl **gauge** 14 sts for 8 5 row worked in blo half_double_crochet in 4 10 cm **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni 1 https //raffamusa--itchinforsomestitchin thrivecart com/spring-into-summer-pattern-bundle/ 2 https //raffamusa--itchinforsomestitchin thrivecart com/spring-into-summer-pattern-bundle/643fa6dcb59aa/
